channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Post Styling
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Post Styling

item.title: CVE-2022-1845|2024-08-03T00:17:00.813Z -- unknown -- wp%20post%20styling
item.description: The WP Post Styling WordPress plugin before 1.3.1 does not have CSRF checks in various actions, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin delete plugin's data, update the settings, add new entries and more via CSRF attacks
